The claim originated from several Twitte: Shahi Imam at New Delhi’s Jama Masjid, would issue a fatwa against Tanishq for "destroying Islamic culture" due to the absence of a baby shower ritual in Islam.
The claim was shared with a picture of B: 3. Alt News, a fact-checking organization, could not find any news reports confirming that Jama Masjid would issue a fatwa against Tanishq.
Syed Shaban Bukhari: Vice Shahi Imam at Jama Masjid, New Delhi, denied the existence of any fatwa issued by Jama Masjid and expressed his appreciation for the advertisement promoting love and unity between different religious communities.
